titles.title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to protect elected and appointed judges against discrimination based on age.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 5/3/1995--Introduced. Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to revise the definition of "employee," for purposes of the Act, with regard to persons elected or appointed to judicial office.
